mapper.select: SELECT id, pic_code, pic_name, pic_file_name, pic_type, pic_size, pic_weight, pic_high, pic_suffix, pic_level, pic_format, pic_path, pic_desc, pic_ordering, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, is_deleted, business_id FROM draw_res_house_pic WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO draw_res_house_pic( pic_code, pic_name, pic_file_name, pic_type, pic_size, pic_weight, pic_high, pic_suffix, pic_level, pic_format, pic_path, pic_desc, pic_ordering, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, is_deleted, business_id, small_pic_info ) VALUES
(#{item.picCode}, #{item.picName}, #{item.picFileName}, #{item.picType}, #{item.picSize}, #{item.picWeight}, #{item.picHigh}, #{item.picSuffix}, #{item.picLevel}, #{item.picFormat}, #{item.picPath}, #{item.picDesc}, #{item.picOrdering}, #{item.sysCode}, #{item.creator}, #{item.gmtCreate}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.isDeleted}, #{item.businessId}, #{item.smallPicInfo})

#{item}

#{item}

update draw_res_house_pic
pic_code = #{picCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_name = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_file_name = #{picFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_type = #{picType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_size = #{picSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic_weight = #{picWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_high = #{picHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_suffix = #{picSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_level = #{picLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_format = #{picFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_desc = #{picDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_ordering = #{picOrdering,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_key = #{fileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_keys = #{fileKeys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_ids = #{businessIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
small_pic_info = #{smallPicInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_point = #{viewPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scene = #{scene,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
att1 = #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
att2 = #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
numa1 = #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
numa2 = #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thumbnail_path = #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
large_thumbnail_path = #{largeThumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
